categories.title: Recent Developments in Web3 Marketing, AI Plugins, and Tech-Support Bots

content.text:
### Web3 Narrative Marketing Automation
- **Developer**: shivam_18795
- **Tech Stack**: Langchain + ElizaOS
- **Features**: Draft editing, scheduled replies, performance tracking, and feedback loops.
- **Next Steps**: Seeking early testers and improving content feedback mechanisms.

### Token Prediction Plugin
- **Developer**: dorianjanezic
- **Current Implementation**: Data → Prediction → Checks → Evaluation → Summary
- **Next Steps**: Implementing reinforcement learning for improved accuracy.
- **Example Prediction**: Identified a 'pump, dump, and pump again' pattern.
- **GitHub Repository**: [plugin-token-prediction](https://github.com/dorianjanezic/eliza/tree/komo-main/packages/plugin-token-prediction).

### Tech-Support Bot on ElizaOS
- **Developer**: chris.troutner
- **Tech Stack**: JavaScript, Bitcoin, GitHub integration, local AI models (Ollama)
- **Infrastructure**: Custom-built Linux desktop with NVIDIA GeForce 3060 (12GB VRAM)
- **Clients**: Telegram, Nostr (censorship-resistant alternative to Twitter/Discord)
- **Next Steps**: Developing a Nostr plugin, separating knowledge base from bot code.

### AI Agents for Non-Technical Users
- **Developer**: dtb0x
- **Platform**: aigent.sh (powered by ElizaOS)
- **Next Steps**: Continuous updates, seeking user feedback.

### Plugin and AI SDK Updates
- **Bug Fix for Character Plugins**: dtb0x submitted a fix for loading character plugins from remote URLs.
- **Mem0 AI SDK Provider**: whysosaket introduced Mem0 as a provider in the Vercel AI SDK, adding a memory layer.
- **Onchain Token Price Plugin**: 0xmattsroka developed a plugin for fetching token prices across 20+ chains, powered by DexPaprika.
- **Twitter Plugin Update**: tadeuchi submitted a PR for a forked Twitter plugin that fetches post data.
- **Distributed Storage Plugin**: fforbeck added a distributed storage plugin to Eliza's Plugin Registry.
- **Broken Plugin Link Issue**: flaneurofmetaverses reported a broken link in the plugin registry for `plugin-bnv-me-id`.

### AI-News Aggregation Setup
- **Developer**: dankvr
- **Implementation**: Set up AI-news aggregation for multiple Discord channels.

categories.title: Docker Issues and Optimizations in Eliza V2

content.text: Users encountered authentication errors when running Eliza in Docker. The recommended solution is to check environment variables using `doctor inspect`.
Cloudflare security changes blocked Twitter logins for agents running in Docker on GCP. A fix was implemented in PR #3793.
V2 will include Docker optimizations such as smaller images, faster builds, and dynamic character file specification.
Users faced SQLite module errors when running Eliza in Docker. The suggested fix is to force reinstall `better-sqlite3` and rebuild it.
CLI issues were reported in V2 when using `npx @elizaos/cli start`. Fixes are being worked on, and registry updates are needed.

categories.title: ElizaOS Development Updates and Plugin Enhancements

content.text: Cloudflare security changes blocked Twitter logins for agents running in Docker on GCP. A fix was implemented in PR #3793.
Duplicate memories were identified in JSDocs, and a rebase was performed to resolve the issue.
A newline bug in the Twitter agent caused incorrect formatting in tweets. The issue was tracked in Issue #3897.
A Git submodule issue on Windows was resolved by removing and re-adding the submodule.
V2 migration requires an auto-migration tool for plugins, which is currently in development.
Users discussed running multiple agents with separate Twitter accounts. Namespacing in V2 allows for this setup.
Users reported embedding errors, and debugging steps were suggested.
V2 will include Docker optimizations such as smaller images, faster builds, and dynamic character file specification.
The `plugin-local-ai` plugin now supports the Ollama API for local LLMs, with configuration details shared.
Users faced issues with `npx @elizaos/cli start`, and fixes were suggested.
Some plugins, such as `plugin-llama`, were missing from the registry, causing installation failures.
New documentation was deployed at eliza.how, with ongoing improvements discussed.
A Web3 narrative marketing automation tool is being developed using Langchain and ElizaOS, with features like draft editing, scheduled replies, and performance tracking.
A token prediction plugin was developed with a feedback loop for improved accuracy, and reinforcement learning is being considered for future updates.
A tech-support bot using ElizaOS is being developed, integrating JavaScript, Bitcoin, GitHub, and local AI models.
A new AI agent platform, Aigent.sh, was launched to make AI agents accessible to non-technical users.
A plugin for fetching token prices across 20+ chains was developed, powered by DexPaprika.
A distributed storage plugin was added to Eliza's Plugin Registry.
A Twitter plugin update was submitted to fetch post data back to the calling client.
A broken link issue was reported in the plugin registry, and a fix was requested.
